meanings.definition: A plant with large, lobed leaves and tall spikes of white or purplish flowers.
meanings.sent1: The acanthus in the garden has beautiful purple flowers.
meanings.sent2: I saw an acanthus plant with white flowers in the park.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorn under the acanthus leaves.
meanings.sent4: Her hair cascaded down her back like the lush acanthus leaves.
meanings.sent5: The acanthus plant stood proudly in the sunlight, its leaves shimmering.

meanings.definition: The decorative motif of the leaves of the acanthus plant, often used in architecture and design.
meanings.sent1: The intricate acanthus design adorned the top of the ancient pillar.
meanings.sent2: The artist sketched the acanthus pattern for the new building's facade.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten tried to climb the curtains with the acanthus pattern.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as elegant and detailed as the acanthus carvings on the door.
meanings.sent5: The acanthus motif added a touch of sophistication to the room's decor.
